mapper.select: select * from ma_wf_act_status a order by a.DATASEQ
select * from ma_wf_act_status a where guid = #GUID#
mapper.insert:
insert into ma_wf_act_status ( guid, MAWFACTFK, FROMSTATUS, TOSTATUS, DATASEQ, createtime, createuserguid, updatetime, updateuserguid ) values ( #GUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #MAWFACTFK:VARCHAR:NULL#, #FROMSTATUS:VARCHAR:NULL#, #TOSTATUS:VARCHAR:NULL#, #DATASEQ#,
#CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #CREATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #UPDATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL# )
mapper.update:
update ma_wf_act_status
UPDATETIME=#CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, UPDATEUSERGUID=#UPDATEUSERGUID#, MAWFACTFK=#MAWFACTFK#, FROMSTATUS=#FROMSTATUS#, TOSTATUS=#TOSTATUS#, DATASEQ=#DATASEQ#,
WHERE guid = #GUID#
